abstract: Judge Lucy Koh warned that both sides faced risks if an intellectual property suit was handed to a federal jury.
snippet: Judge Lucy Koh warned that both sides faced risks if an intellectual property suit was handed to a federal jury.
lead_paragraph: The judge presiding over an intellectual property dispute between Apple and Samsung Electronics said on Wednesday that the chief executives of the two companies should talk again before the jury begins its deliberations.

headline.main: Judge Urges Apple and Samsung to Settle Their Patent Dispute
headline.print_headline: Judge Urges Apple and Samsung to Settle Their Patent Dispute
